TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GridViewDeletedEventHandler(object sender, GridViewDeletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GridViewDeletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GridViewDeletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GridViewDeletedEventArgs)
public delegate void GridViewDeletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GridViewDeletedEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.summary: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件時刪除 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete") 控制項內按一下時，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項刪除資料錄。 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如檢查刪除作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。
建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。
[!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewDeletedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventHandler/CS/gridviewdeletedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewDeletedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewDeletedEventHandler/VB/gridviewdeletedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]
下列範例示範如何以宣告方式將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。
[!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowDeleted#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDeleted/CS/gridviewrowdeletedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowDeleted#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowDeleted/VB/gridviewrowdeletedvb.aspx#1)]
